TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogicalMethodInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo> 主要由使用的 SOAP 扩展以便询问与其 SOAP 扩展配置为运行 XML Web service 方法的详细信息。 根据 SOAP 扩展的配置方式，它可以找出有关中的 XML Web 服务方法的详细信息<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension.GetInitializer%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>采用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo>。 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo>访问提供的详细信息，如 XML Web service 方法的参数<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.Parameters%2A>属性和任何自定义特性应用于 XML Web 服务方法使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>属性。
有关 SOAP 扩展的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapExtension>类或[ [ \<topic://cpconAlteringSOAPMessageUsingSOAPExtensions >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/97d81ace-95e7-4acc-ae39-9692a0021e95)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo methodInfo) cil managed
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo method_info) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the passed in.
Docs.exception: The property of the parameter is . -or- The method of the parameter does not contain all the parameters required by the method represented by the instance of .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncCallbackParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncCallbackParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a Begin method in an asynchronous invocation.
Docs.value: A表示参数异步方法调用。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。 `Begin`方法采用除了同步版本的方法定义的参数的两个其他参数： 一个以用于存储委托，而另一个存储任何需要传递给委托的状态信息。 此属性表示该委托的参数名称与参数`AsyncCallback`。
以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \<topic://cpconInvokingWebServicesAsynchronously >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。
## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AsyncResultParameter As ParameterInfo
public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncResultParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the return value of a asynchronous method invocation.
Docs.value: A表示从返回异步方法调用。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。 `Begin`方法通常会立即返回一个对象，实现与<xref:System.IAsyncResult>接口，然后传递给`End`在以后完成的异步方法调用的方法。 返回的对象实现<xref:System.IAsyncResult>接口表示此属性。
以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \<topic://cpconInvokingWebServicesAsynchronously >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。
## Examples [!code-cpp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CPP/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/CS/logicalmethodinfo_create2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LogicalMethodInfo_Create2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/LogicalMethodInfo_Create2/VB/logicalmethodinfo_create2.vb#1)]

public: property System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ AsyncStateParameter { System::Reflection::ParameterInfo ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the parameter information for the parameter of a method in an asynchronous invocation.
Docs.value: A表示参数异步调用中的方法。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 公共语言运行时中的异步设计模式涉及调用`Begin`方法来开始异步方法调用和`End`来完成调用的方法。 `Begin`方法采用除了同步版本的方法定义的参数的两个其他参数： 一个以用于存储委托，而另一个存储任何需要传递给委托的状态信息。 此属性表示需要传递到委托的状态信息。
以异步方式调用 XML Web 服务的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \<topic://cpconInvokingWebServicesAsynchronously >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9e26a43-063a-440a-8c73-a02f2ccf3ea0)。

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginInvoke (object target, object[] values, AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(object target, object[] values, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState) cil managed
Public Function BeginInvoke (target As Object, values As Object(), callback As AsyncCallback, asyncState As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginInvoke(System::Object ^ target, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ values, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ asyncState);
member this.BeginInvoke : obj * obj[] * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The instance of the on which to invoke the method on.

An argument list for the invoked method. This is an array of objects with the same number, order, and type as the parameters of the method. If the method does not require any parameters, values should be .
The delegate to call when the asynchronous invoke is complete. If callback is , the delegate is not called.
State information that is passed on to the delegate.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous invocation of the method represented by this .
Docs.returns: An which is passed to to obtain the return values from the remote method call.
Docs.exception: The number, type, and order of parameters in do not match the signature of the invoked method.
The caller does not have permission to invoke the method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.DeclaringType%2A>属性检索的引用<xref:System.Type>声明此成员的类型。 类 （或接口） 的成员声明或继承自基类 （或接口）。 返回<xref:System.Type>可能不是相同<xref:System.Type>实现 XML Web 服务的类 (如果该类派生自的基类，并且在该基类中声明此类所表示的方法则<xref:System.Type>返回基本的类）。
